classes.warning: For now, you cannot edit these configurations as they are not yet implemented. This feature is under development.

email.title: Email
email.description: Emails are the most common form of communication. They work on any device, be it your phone, your computer or even your watch.

push.title: Push
push.subtitle: Enable push notifications
push.description: Push notifications enable us to keep you up to date with everything that is happening. Sadly, push notifications do not work on IOS phones. (expected in 2023)

home.description: Revolutionary school tracking app for Efiriyad students
home.subtitle: With iOS & Android offline app support
home.copyright: Â© 2022 Efiriyad, Inc. All rights reserved

features.title: All in one place
features.description: Efiriyad app comes with all the features of Pronote and Skolengo combined. You will find everything you need to lead a successfully school year, all in one app.

notifications.title: Realtime notifications
notifications.description: Efiriyad app is built to support realtime notifications. We will notify you when a new activity appears, such as a new grade or a new homework.
